forecast.day_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. Breezy, with a southwest wind around 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow likely, mainly after 1pm. The snow could be heavy at times.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 30. Windy, with a southwest wind 25 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
